definitions.definition: the soft part of the body of a person or animal that is between the skin and the bones, or the soft inside part of a fruit or vegetable:
examples: The thorn went deep into the flesh of my hand.

definitions.definition: the physical body and not the mind or the soul:
examples: This left him plenty of time to indulge in the pleasures of the flesh (= physical pleasures, such as sex or eating).
